text: Metallic may be a reference to: *Metal *Metalloid, metal-like substance *Metallic bonding, type of chemical bonding *Metallicity, in astronomy the proportion of elements other than helium and hydrogen in an object *Metallic color, a color that gives the appearance of metal *Metallic dragon, a classification of dragon found in the role playing game Dungeons & Dragons *Metallic paint, paint that provides the appearance of metal *Heavy metal music, a genre of rock music ==See also== *Metallica (disambiguation)
title: Metallic
